languages.text: Замысловатая игровая доска с зачарованными фигурами светлых и темных эльдаров. Ее хозяин постоянно чувствует на себе чей-то взгляд и становится более чувствителен к проявлениям пси-активностей.

traits.locale_text: Замысловая игровая доска с зачарованными фигурами светлых и темных эльдар. Ее хозяин постоянно чувствует на себе чей-то взгляд и становится более чувствителен к проявлениям пси-активностей.

languages.text: An intricate game board with enchanted figurines of Asuryani and Drukhari. Its owner has the constant feeling of being watched and becomes more sensitive to psychic activity manifestations.
languages.original_text: Замысловатая игровая доска с зачарованными фигурами светлых и темных эльдаров. Ее хозяин постоянно чувствует на себе чей-то взгляд и становится более чувствителен к проявлениям пси-активностей.

traits.locale_text: An intricate game board with enchanted figurines of light and dark Aeldari. Its owner has the constant feeling of being watched and becomes more sensitive to psychic activity manifestations.
An intricate game board with enchanted figurines of light and dark Aeldari. Its owner has the constant feeling of being watched and becomes more sensitive to psychic activity manifestations.
An intricate game board with enchanted figurines of light and dark Aeldari. Its owner has the constant feeling of being watched and becomes more sensitive to psychic activity manifestations.
An intricate game board with enchanted figurines of light and dark Aeldari. Its owner has the constant feeling of being watched and becomes more sensitive to psychic activity manifestations.
An intricate game board with enchanted figurines of Asuryani and Drukhari. Its owner has the constant feeling of being watched and becomes more sensitive to psychic activity manifestations.

languages.text: Un intrincado tablero de juego con figurillas encantadas que representan Drukhari y Asuryani. Su propietario tiene la constante sensación de que alguien le observa, y se vuelve más sensible a las manifestaciones de actividad psíquica.
languages.original_text: An intricate game board with enchanted figurines of Asuryani and Drukhari. Its owner has the constant feeling of being watched and becomes more sensitive to psychic activity manifestations.

traits.locale_text: Un intrincado tablero de juego con figurillas encantadas que representan Aeldari de colores claros y oscuros. Su propietario tiene la constante sensación de que alguien le observa, y se vuelve más sensible a las manifestaciones de actividad psíquica.

languages.text: 神秘的なアシュリヤーニとデュカーリ像が付属する精巧な遊戯盤。所有者は常に監視されているような感覚を持ち、精神活動の発現に敏感になっている。
languages.original_text: An intricate game board with enchanted figurines of Asuryani and Drukhari. Its owner has the constant feeling of being watched and becomes more sensitive to psychic activity manifestations.

traits.locale_text: 神秘的なアシュリヤーニとデュカーリ像が付属する精巧な遊戯盤。所有者は常に監視されているような感覚を持ち、精神活動の発現に敏感になっている。

languages.text: 这块错综复杂的棋盘上摆放着黑白两色的黑暗灵族与方舟灵族雕像，其中蕴含着某种魔力。这个棋盘的持有者总会有种遭到监视的感觉，对灵能活动的感觉也会变得更加敏感。
languages.original_text: An intricate game board with enchanted figurines of Asuryani and Drukhari. Its owner has the constant feeling of being watched and becomes more sensitive to psychic activity manifestations.

traits.locale_text: 这块错综复杂的棋盘上摆放着黑白两色的艾达灵族雕像，其中蕴含着某种魔力。这个棋盘的持有者总会有种遭到监视的感觉，对灵能活动的感觉也会变得更加敏感。

languages.text: Un plateau de jeu complexe doté de figurines enchantées représentant des Asuryanis et des Drukharis. Son propriétaire a constamment l'impression d'être surveillé et devient plus sensible aux manifestations psychiques.
languages.original_text: An intricate game board with enchanted figurines of Asuryani and Drukhari. Its owner has the constant feeling of being watched and becomes more sensitive to psychic activity manifestations.

traits.locale_text: Un plateau de jeu complexe doté de figurines enchantées représentant des Aeldaris noirs et blancs. Son propriétaire a constamment l'impression d'être surveillé et devient plus sensible aux manifestations psychiques.

languages.text: Ein aufwändig verziertes Spielbrett mit magischen Figuren von Asuryani und Drukhari. Der Besitzer hat das ständige Gefühl, beobachtet zu werden, und wird empfänglicher für Manifestationen psychischer Aktivität.
languages.original_text: An intricate game board with enchanted figurines of Asuryani and Drukhari. Its owner has the constant feeling of being watched and becomes more sensitive to psychic activity manifestations.

traits.locale_text: Ein kompliziertes Spielbrett mit verzauberten Spielfiguren von hellen und dunklen Aeldari. Sein Besitzer bekommt ständig das Gefühl, beobachtet zu werden, und wird sensibler für Manifestationen seelischer Aktivitäten.

languages.text: Büyülü Drukhari ile Asuryani figürleri barındıran, çetrefilli bir oyun tahtası. Mütemadiyen izlendiği hissine kapılan sahibi, ruhsezi faaliyetine karşı hassaslaşmış.
languages.original_text: An intricate game board with enchanted figurines of Asuryani and Drukhari. Its owner has the constant feeling of being watched and becomes more sensitive to psychic activity manifestations.

traits.locale_text: Büyülü Drukhari ile Asuryani figürleri barındıran, çetrefilli bir oyun tahtası. Sahibi, mütemadiyen izlendiği hissine kapılarak ruhsezi faaliyeti oluşumlarına karşı daha hassas bir hâle gelmiş.
